name: electricity, high voltage, import from BR-Northern grid | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25914/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported electricity from the Brazilian Southern electricity grid to the Brazilian South-eastern electricity grid. For a discussion of different ways of modeling electricity trade in LCI, please refer to Itten et al. 2014. Itten R., Frischknecht R. and Stucki M. (2014) Life Cycle Inventories of Electricity Mixes and Grid. Version 1.3 Report issued on behalf of Paul Scherrer Institut (PSI). treeze Ltd., Uster, Switzerland, retrieved from: www.lc-inventories.ch

This activity represents the point of 'handing over' the electricity from one electricity grid to the other at the border.

This dataset doesn't include any electricity losses or transmission infrastructure as these are accounted for in the market datasets.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Literature data: The total amount of electricity imported to the BR South-eastern grid in 2014 was found in literaure. The split of this amount between the supplying grids was done based on the share of the installed transmission capacities between the grids.
